channel.title: Sapphire 718
channel.description:
[FONT=Tahoma][SIZE=4]Please ignore the *malicious* software on our website page. Its because our webclient is set as [B]unknown publisher It's completely harmless.[/B]
[/SIZE]
[CENTER] [SIZE=4][URL=http://www.sapphireps.com/]Website[/URL] [URL=http://http://www.sapphireps.com/forum]Community Boards[/URL] [URL=http://http://www.sapphireps.com/game]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://http://sapphireps.com/forum/index.php?app=core&module=global&section=register]Create an Account[/URL] [URL=http://http://sapphireps.com/forum/index.php?app=tickets]Report a Player or Bug [/URL] [URL=http://http://www.sapphireps.com/game/Sapphire.jar]Download[/URL] [URL=http://http://www.google.com/toplist/vote-37142.html]Vote Link 1[/URL] [URL=http://http://rspsdesigns.com/toplist/index.php?action=vote&id=41]Vote Link 2[/URL][/SIZE]
Features: Grand Exchange Squeal of Fortune Great Combat Beautiful home area 25 Functional Skills including summoning & Construction & -Dungeonneering! Great community and staff Flawless npc's with working dialogues (70% working) Perfect PvM Perfect PvP Xp Counter Lots of dupes fixed New Combat Icons! Dominion Tower Pk Points + Shop Revenants Slayer Towers Donator Zone Gambling Working Polypore Dungeon! Tormented Demons Summoning Including Storage Economy Full Chaotic and PvP Armor Degrading Amazing Graphics Lots of Minigames Unique Content Working Magic Donator pets Working pickup/drop pets XP lamps/books No lag, no crashes 100% uptime, no downtimes Corporal Beast with dark core! Jad Barrows Working nexus 100% Highscores System Glacors Great looking homepage, forums, webclient, etc. Auto Voting System And much much much more!
More updates have been added!
Cooking Assistant Quest Lost City Quest Welcome message dialogue New Santa claus with Christmas event More players have joined!
All our players so far + 20 more! [IMG]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/8624/ith3.png[/img]
